Maximum Likelihood Estimation (MLE)

Let D={Di:i=1…n}D = \{D_i:i=1\dots n\}D={Di​:i=1…n} where Di=(yi,Xi)D_i = (y_i, X_i)Di​=(yi​,Xi​), where each DiD_iDi​ is iid. Suppose that there is some parameter θ∈Θ\theta \in \Thetaθ∈Θ. Then the joint probability density function P(D∣θ)P(D\mid\theta)P(D∣θ) - or the likelihood Ln(θ)L_n(\theta)Ln​(θ) is

Ln(θ)=∏i=1nP(Di∣θ)L_n(\theta) = \prod_{i=1}^n P(D_i\mid\theta)Ln​(θ)=∏i=1n​P(Di​∣θ)

The joint PDF gives us the likelihood of the iid sample given θ\thetaθ. The negative log likelihood (NLL) then becomes

−log⁡Ln(θ)=−∑i=1nlog⁡P(Di∣θ)-\log{L_n(\theta)} = - \sum_{i=1}^n \log{P(D_i\mid\theta)}−logLn​(θ)=−∑i=1n​logP(Di​∣θ)

The goal is to have some estimate of θ\thetaθ that describes the samples that we observe. Therefore, we want to maximize the likelihood function LnL_nLn​ with respect to θ\thetaθ - or minimize the NLL. The maximum likelihood estimator (MLE) is defined as

θ^MLE∈arg⁡max⁡θ∈Θ{−log⁡Ln(θ)}\hat{{\theta}}_{MLE} \in \underset{\theta \in \Theta}{\arg \max} \{-\log{L_n(\theta)}\}θ^MLE​∈θ∈Θargmax​{−logLn​(θ)}

The MLE estimator θ^MLE\hat{{\theta}}_{MLE}θ^MLE​ is the value which we are most likely to observe DDD.

Maximum a Posteriori (MAP) Estimation

MLE estimates θ\thetaθ by maximizing the likelihood of seeing DDD conditional on θ\thetaθ, but it's more intuitive to think of learning θ\thetaθ conditional on observing DDD - i.e. what we really want to find θ\thetaθ that has the highest prob ability given the data. From Bayes' rule we have

P(θ∣D)=P(θ,D)P(D)P(\theta\mid D) = \frac{P(\theta, D)}{P(D)}P(θ∣D)=P(D)P(θ,D)​

P(θ∣D)=P(D∣θ)P(θ)P(D)P(\theta\mid D) = \frac{P(D\mid \theta)P(\theta)}{P(D)}P(θ∣D)=P(D)P(D∣θ)P(θ)​

P(θ∣D)∝P(D∣θ)P(θ)P(\theta\mid D) \propto P(D\mid \theta)P(\theta)P(θ∣D)∝P(D∣θ)P(θ)

Following the same way MLE estimated θ\thetaθ from minimizing the NLL, the maximum a posteriori (MAP) estimator can be obtained from minimizing the NLL where Ln(θ)=P(θ∣D)∝P(D∣θ)P(θ)L_n(\theta) = P(\theta\mid D) \propto P(D\mid \theta)P(\theta)Ln​(θ)=P(θ∣D)∝P(D∣θ)P(θ).

θ^MAP∈arg⁡min⁡θ∈Θ{−∑i=1nlog⁡P(Di∣θ)−log⁡P(θ)}\hat{{\theta}}_{MAP} \in \underset{\theta \in \Theta}{\arg \min} \{-\sum_{i=1}^n \log{P{(D_i\mid\theta)}} - \log{P(\theta)}\}θ^MAP​∈θ∈Θargmin​{−∑i=1n​logP(Di​∣θ)−logP(θ)}
